name: hatch
description: The exit hatch of the pod.

state_descriptions.locked: The hatch is sealed tightly by a locking mechanism. There is a red handwheel labeled release built into the hatch.
state_descriptions.unlocked: The locking mechanism has been disengaged and the is now open revealing a sandy beach.

state_transitions.locked: With a slight twist of the handwheel you reengage the locking mechanism. The hatch slowly closes and seals with a sharp hiss.
state_transitions.unlocked: With some effort you twist the handwheel disengaging the lock. There is a sharp hiss as the hatch begins to open.

state_descriptions.open: The hatch hangs open forming a boarding ramp for the escape pod.

state_transitions.open: Safety mechanisms prevent the hatch from closing without an occupant in the pod.

name: trail
description: A winding trail that leads into the jungle.

state_descriptions.dangerous: Without a way of navigating you will likely get lost.
state_descriptions.safe: Now that you have a compass you orient yourself east. Now navigating the jungle will be much safer.

state_transitions.dangerous: Without a way of navigating you will likely get lost.
state_transitions.safe: Now that you have a compass you orient yourself east. Now navigating the jungle will be much safer.

key_info.message: Using the compass you get you bearings.

name: trail
description: A winding trail that leads west back to the beach.

state_descriptions.dangerous: Without a way of navigating you will likely get lost.
state_descriptions.safe: Now that you have a compass navigating the jungle will be much safer.

state_transitions.dangerous: Without a way of navigating you will likely get lost.
state_transitions.safe: Now that you have a compass navigating the jungle will be much safer.

name: ForestPath
description: A vague trail leads to a clearing, as you follow, on one side you of the path you can make out railing, its damaged.

state_descriptions.dangerous: Remember your grandfathers words, caution is careful, careful keeps you alive.
state_descriptions.safe: In better circumstances you would take the time to look at the scenery.

state_transitions.dangerous: A feeling of overwhelming fear strikes you.
state_transitions.safe: You breathe a sigh of relief as you move forward.

name: ForestPath
description: The forest swallows you once more.

state_descriptions.dangerous: You body is tense, your on edge.

state_transitions.safe: Little by little i'll make it through this dense flora.

name: Highway
description: You walk a long derelict road.

state_descriptions.dangerous: I heard something walk over glass, im not alone.
state_descriptions.safe: Despite the scenery, I dont feel any danger.

state_transitions.dangerous: Its near, what do I do?!
state_transitions.safe: Its okay, im alive, im still alive.

name: Highway
description: The walk feels longer then it did before.

state_descriptions.dangerous: I have to be careful, one wrong move and im a goner.
state_descriptions.safe: The quiet is unsettling, but I still feel at ease.

state_transitions.dangerous: I'm not alone, somethings here, I have a bad feeling.
state_transitions.safe: Little by little i'll make it through this dense flora.

name: SecurityRoute
description: The road is marked by multiple security checkpoints.

name: SecurityRoute
description: The only sound I hear is my feet on the pavement as I move around dead barricades.

state_descriptions.dangerous: I have to be careful, one wrong move and im a goner.
state_descriptions.safe: The quiet is unsettling, but I still feel at ease.

state_transitions.dangerous: I'm not alone, somethings here, I have a bad feeling.
state_transitions.safe: Little by little i'll make it through this dense flora.

name: ResidentialPath
description: The path is lined by gardens, now unkempt and wild.

state_descriptions.dangerous: Without a way of navigating you will likely get lost.
state_descriptions.safe: Now that you have a compass navigating the jungle will be much safer.

state_transitions.dangerous: Without a way of navigating you will likely get lost.
state_transitions.safe: Now that you have a compass navigating the jungle will be much safer.

name: ResidentialPath
description: The smell of a variety of plants assaults you on your way.

state_descriptions.dangerous: I have to be careful, one wrong move and im a goner.
state_descriptions.safe: The quiet is unsettling, but I still feel at ease.

state_transitions.dangerous: I'm not alone, somethings here, I have a bad feeling.
state_transitions.safe: Little by little i'll make it through this dense flora.

state_descriptions.safe: Now that you have a compass navigating the jungle will be much safer.

state_transitions.dangerous: Without a way of navigating you will likely get lost.
state_transitions.safe: Now that you have a compass navigating the jungle will be much safer.

name: ReactorPasage
description: The sound is muffled as you make your way through tight corridors.

state_descriptions.dangerous: I have to be careful, one wrong move and im a goner.
state_descriptions.safe: The quiet is unsettling, but I still feel at ease.

state_transitions.dangerous: I'm not alone, somethings here, I have a bad feeling.

name: TheExpanse
description: little light reaches these depths, you move slowly towards the beach, your not coming back.

state_descriptions.dangerous: Without a way of navigating you will likely get lost.
state_descriptions.safe: Now that you have a compass navigating the jungle will be much safer.
